description: Actor-Artist-Dreamer and a part-time investigator/journalist on here, Instagram (IncrediblyAverageBrian) & YouTube.  I'm always tired.

tweets.text: Today is basically asking people if they like Johnny Depp and if they don't like him anymore. It's all character attacks and nothing to do with anything remotely close to if he abused Amber Heard.

Really hammering this whole "Johnny Depp used drugs..he was late to set" and still no "I saw him be violent with someone/anyone".
Not even a "he changed when he would drink or do drugs". Nothing.

More of Amber Heard's sister, Whitney definitely not saying anything cross about her. It was only Johnny Depp who didn't like being abused and said "mean" things 🙄 https://t.co/zo9euprhug https://t.co/LwDdf6cec2
I'm gonna need a medical professional to tell me that Arnica Cream/Gel does not cause swelling to instantly go down. Maybe I'm wrong but that seems like a miracle in a tube if so.
Whitney Heard: Johnny would say mean things about Amber. Meanwhile...also Whitney (in grey) talking about her sister: https://t.co/hqcrdvP73w

Johnny Depp helped Whitney Heard and empathized with her suffering at the hands of Amber Heard. This feels like a look of "How can you sit there and lie like that?" Heartbreaking 💔 https://t.co/s6W3jb6nVD

This narrative of Amber never did wrong, never had a drug or drinking problem, never needed therapy/help (until Johnny) doesn't play well when we've heard the real Amber in audio already. Painting her as perfect & never in the wrong only shows how much Whitney is willing to lie.
This is already WAY too rehearsed. Whitney has her jumping off points and has it all at the ready to spill what she was told.

And we finally get Amber Heard's sister, Whitney...who was abused by Amber as well. It has been said that she is terrified of Amber and is very much willing to repeat her lies because of that. So here we go.

Josh Drew: Rocky said something bad just happened! So Josh left and went back home to wait...leaving Rocky to run upstairs to potentially have an encounter with "the monster." A gentleman in every sense of the word.

Josh Drew: Amber hadn't been responding to Rocky's texts on December 15, 2015 & that's what led he & Rocky to let themselves into PH3 when they returned home. But Raquel said it was because Amber summoned her to come over. Which is it? She wasn't responding or she beckoned Rocky?
Wow what a pose in that picture
What is this body language and these face contortions??
@TheNamesQ @RockyPMMA @cheeryrosie Please!
I have to wonder if Raquel has been at home watching the trial. And if so...hearing/seeing everything that has come to light about Amber Heard...if she feels like a fool for being fooled.
The sighs at the end of each of Raquel's dull toned answers cannot be going over well with the jurors. But what do I know? @LumberLaw @KyDUIGuy @legalbytesmedia What say you?
Where are the pictures of ALL that blood? It should be everywhere right? Bed. Hair. Face. All of it! Instead we get splinters and split ends.

Raquel knowing Amber Heard didn't have the injuries she claimed Johnny Depp allegedly gave her. Trying to match what Amber said. But nothing she says nor the pics line up with what AH claimed. Tired? Chapped lips? Botox? Maybe. But not the life threatening event AH testified to.

Amber Heard's "key witnesses" were once her closest friends during what she describes as the worst time of her life. They only "know" what she told them. They're also no longer her friends. Let that sink in, because I think it speaks louder than any of their parroted testimony.

To summarize...IO saw nothing, witnessed nothing, and knows next to nothing about the actual dynamic that was Johnny Depp & Amber Heard's relationship. He has a really high opinion of himself. But ultimately was just another Amber pawn who bought whatever she told him. End of.
IO loves IO. That much is true.
